name: SpookWave
description:
The whole studio is buzzing with excitement as your team prepares to launch a new video series that's slated to propel the company to new heights. However you can't shake the feeling that you are missing out on a few key details, so it's up to you to do initiate some good old fashion office talk.

'SpookWave' is a single-player, narrative focused, first person game that takes place inside the small but successful online video production studio 'SpookWave'.

**DEVELOPER NOTE**  When the game ends there will be a pop-up error that displays on the screen.  Simply refresh the page and it will go away. We are working on fixing this bug.

CONTROLS:
WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
Mouse: Look
ESC: Options 
Spacebar/Click: Continue 
Right/Alt-click: Zoom

DURATION:
Under two minutes

DEVELOPERS:
Christine Fouron (MagicDoogies)- Game Designer, Art Direction, 3D Modeler
Chris Kindred (ChrisKindred)- Game Designer, Narrative Designer

Created for the 2020 'Two-Minute Horror' Game Jam.
